title: Footpath
occurrences: ''Sleep on the footpath, if you must''
A friend of mine. Was separated from me on this very footpath
''On this footpath, l have seen every dream being shattered''
But the footpath under the skies has snatched our childhood from us
''l know the endgame. l'll be lying somewhere on the footpath, unclaimed...''
is going to die on this footpath from an overdose of drugs
My life on this footpath is over... it's finished
